pali_1:
Venerables, the thirteen cases related to saṅghādisesa (offence) have been recited, nine
[cases] are of the offence-at-once [-class], four [cases] are of the
up-to the-third [time admonition-class].

pali_1:
A bhikkhu who has
committed any one of [these offenses], has to stay on probation
with no choice [in the matter] for as many days as he knowingly
conceals [it].

pali_1:
Moreover, by a bhikkhu who has stayed on the
probation, a six-night state of deference to [other] bhikkhus has to
be entered upon.

pali_1:
[When] the bhikkhu [is one by whom] the
deference has been performed: wherever there may be a community
of bhikkhus, which is a group of twenty [or more bhikkhus], there that bhikkhu should be reinstated.

sentence: ekena'pi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, so ca bhikkhu anabbhito, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
meaning: even by one, by just one

ekena'pi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, so ca bhikkhu anabbhito, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
meaning: right thing to do, correct course, proper procedure

sentence: ekena'pi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya, so ca bhikkhu anabbhito, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
pali_1:
If a community of bhikkhus,
which is a group of twenty deficient by even one [bhikkhu], should
reinstate that bhikkhu [then] that bhikkhu is not reinstated, and
those monks are blameworthy. This is the proper procedure here.

sentence: tatth'āyasmante pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, dutiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, tatiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā

sentence: tatth'āyasmante pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, dutiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, tatiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā
grammar: masc nom pl of parisuddha, pp of parisujjhati

sentence: tatth'āyasmante pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, dutiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā, tatiyam'pi pucchāmi, kacci'ttha parisuddhā
pali_1:
Concerning that I ask the Venerables: [Are you] pure in this? A second time again I ask: [Are you] pure in this?
A third time again I ask: [Are you] pure in this?

sentence: parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.
meaning: the venerables (are) pure in this regard
meaning_lit: the long lived ones are pure here

sentence: parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.
parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.
parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.
parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.
meaning: I take, I believe, I keep in mind

sentence: parisuddh'etth'āyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evam'etaṃ dhārayāmī'ti.
pali_1:
The venerables are pure in this, therefore there is silence, so do I
bear this [in mind].

sentence: terasa saṅghādisesā niṭṭhitā
terasa saṅghādisesā niṭṭhitā
meaning: offences requiring the involvement of the community in the beginning and the rest
meaning_lit: with the community in the beginning and the rest

sentence: terasa saṅghādisesā niṭṭhitā
terasa saṅghādisesā niṭṭhitā
pali_1:
The recitation concerning the community in the
beginning and the rest [of the procedure] is
finished
